scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd ui && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd ui && npm run build && if not exist "../backend/public" mkdir "../backend/public" && xcopy "dist\*" "../backend/public\" /E /I /Y && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd ui && npm run test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd ui && npm run lint"
